testcase.name: Validate suggestion count in google search
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is already opened with valid url..............................passed When user types "Selenium" in search input field............................passed Then user should get "10" suggestions.......................................passed

testcase.name: Validate suggestion selection in google
testcase.system-out: When user selects "selenium interview questions" from suggestion............passed Then user should be able to see "selenium interview questions" in search input field of next page.passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Test Feature file is created to validate login functionality of OrangeHRM
testcase.name: Validate Login with valid test data in OrangeHRM
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is already opened.............................................passed When user enters application url for OrangeHRM..............................passed And user enters valid user name in OrangeHRM................................passed And user enters valid password in OrangeHRM.................................passed And user clicks on login button in OrangeHRM...............................passed Then user should navigate to home page for OrangeHRM........................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
